name: TutorialJump
text:
How to jump
 > PC: Space
 > Xbox: A
 > Nintendo: B
 > PlayStation: Cross

name: TutorialOlympicJump
text:
Olympic jump: Crouch and jump while moving in any direction
[...]

name: TutorialOlympicJump
text:
How to crouch:
 > PC: Control
 > Xbox: R2
 > Nintendo: ZR
 > PlayStation: R2

name: TutorialLateralJump
text: Lateral jump: Move in any direction, then move to the oposite direction and jump

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
Grabbing items:
 > PC: E
 > Xbox: X
 > Nintendo: Y
 > PlayStation: Square
[...]

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
Dropping items:
 > PC: E
 > Xbox: X
 > Nintendo: Y
 > PlayStation: Square
[...]

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
Throwing items:
 > PC: Q
 > Xbox: Y
 > Nintendo: X
 > PlayStation: Triangle

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
Upscaling items:
 > PC: Right click
 > Xbox: R1
 > Nintendo: R
 > PlayStation: R1
[...]

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
Downscaling items:
 > PC: Right click
 > Xbox: L1
 > Nintendo: L
 > PlayStation: L1

name: TutorialGrabScale
text: You can resize an item while holding it

name: TutorialWalljump
text:
Jump while near a wall to walljump
[...]

name: TutorialWalljump
text: You can hang from corners, jump to climb the corner

name: TutorialBonfire
text: Resting in a bonfire regens your health and respawns enemies

name: TutorialKillingItems
text: Bomb: Downscale it and throw it to an enemy to make it explode

name: TutorialKillingItems
text: Bowling ball: Upscale it and throw it to an enemy to stomp it

name: TutorialEnemies1
text: Skeletons must be downscaled before jumping on them
